SHORT_DESCR.P: Production of a recombinant virus-like particle (VLP) vaccine from HEK293 cells.

We are looking for a contract manufacturer (CMO) for preparatory project work towards GMP-compliant manufacture of a recombinant VLP derived from HEK293 cells. This vaccine will be explored as a prophylactic vaccine in clinical phase I/II studies.

Recombinant HEK293 cells stably carrying a BACmid with the required elements of the viral genome. Production of VLPs is induced by transient transfection with a helper plasmid. The VLP product will be harvested from the cell culture supernatant and subsequently purified, concentrated and characterized.
The contract manufacturer has to comply with the following criteria regarding, expertise, experience, manufacturing process, quality control and product release.
— Long-time experience in the GMP-manufacture of recombinant viral vaccines and virus-like particles (proof by references),
— Experiences in the cultivation of HEK293 cells for both adherent and suspension and transient transfection of HEK293 with plasmid DNA in particular (please explain),
— State of the Art facilities and protocols for the manufacture of Investigational Medicinal Products (please explain),
— Equipment and processes for aseptic liquid filling, packaging and labeling within the GMP-facility (please explain),
— Equipment for generation and storage of eukaryotic cell banks (please confirm or explain),
— Extensive quality control (regarding purity, identity and safety) and product release. Additionally, adaptation and validation of ELISA and cell based analytical assays (please explain),
— EMA certified GMP facility (please copies of the certificates),
— Willingness to interact with the academic partner institutions on a regular basis over the course of the project (please confirm).

INFO_ADD.P: Please send your expression of interest at the latest (13.4.2018) under use of the reference nº 009-18 to: petra.lanzafame@helmholtz-muenchen.de
